item.title: How To Speed Up Firefox 3
item.description: I decided to try Google Chrome today and was pleasantly surprised with itâ€™s speed on loading pages. And I started seeing how slow my Firefox was. At first I thought that it might have something to do with the plugins I have, but then again they are very few, just Echofon, Firebug and Xmarks. So after a little digging I came up with a way to speed up Firefox 3, turn out it was all in the options =)
